name: Goldie's Christmas Adventure
description:
In Goldie's Christmas Adventure, players guide Goldie the golden retriever through a series of lighthearted festive levels as she helps Santa recover presents that the Angry Gingerbread men took from the sleepy village of Utulsa.

Goldie uses the player's quick reflexes and her sense of smell to collect all the presents, golden bones, and solve puzzles in this platformer-puzzle duo.

With its charming characters, fun gameplay, and festive atmosphere, Goldie's Christmas Adventure is sure to be a hit with players of all ages.
